name: watchlistScreeningEntityHistoryList
description: List all changes to the entity watchlist screening in reverse-chronological order. If the watchlist screening has not been edited, no history will be returned.

WatchlistScreeningEntityHistoryListReque.description: Request input for listing changes to entity watchlist screenings

APIClientID.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.
APIClientID.title: ClientID

Cursor.description: An identifier that determines which page of results you receive.

EntityWatchlistScreeningID.description: ID of the associated entity screening.
EntityWatchlistScreeningID.title: EntityWatchlistScreeningID

APISecret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.
APISecret.title: APISecret

$block: Paginated list of entity watchlist screenings

$ul: **next_cursor**: An identifier that determines which page of results you receive.
**request_id**: A unique identifier for the request, which can be used for troubleshooting. This identifier, like all Plaid identifiers, is case sensitive.
